Constructor Detail

CarpetModel

public CarpetModel(int initialLevel,
                   int x,
                   int y,
                   int w)
Constructor for objects of class CarpetModel

Parameters:
initialLevel - represents starting level of Sierpinski Carpet
x - represents x coordinate of upper left corner of Sierpinski Carpet model
y - represents y coordinate of upper left corner of Sierpinski Carpet model
w - represents width and height of Sierpinski Carpet model

changes level of Sierpinski Carpet model

Parameters:
